And many of the shots were alley-oop dunks and rim-rattling jams that were the product of the Nuggets' suddenly stingy defense. They made every shot in the world, Suns coach Mike D'Antoni said.`` They are hard to handle when Carmelo Anthony and Allen Iverson are coming at you like that. They are hard to handle on any night.'' . Dick Cheney of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama .`` He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure,'' Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself. The saga of the`` American Idol'' phenomenon, from its origins in the 2001 hit British series`` Pop Idol'' right up to Simon Cowell 's departure, is the focus of Richard Rushfield's breezy, gossipy American Idol: The Untold Story. Currently an entertainment columnist for the website the Daily Beast and a Vanity Fair contributing editor, Simon Cowell Rushfield blogged about`` American Idol'' for three years for the Los Angeles Times and clearly knows his subject well.

that begins its 10th season tonight. Hyper, effusive and giddy, Steven Tyler 's child-like energy alone sets him apart from the staid and sometimes icy Simon Cowell , who quit after last season. The part that's a little difficult is judging young kids, the 62-year-old said.`` It took me a couple of minutes... I don't take whatever happened with the band or with( his ex-wives) into the judging like some other people might have done.''
